title: Topic 002 Question 010
body: You create a network region Region1 in Microsoft Teams.
You are adding a network site to Region1. The site has a 1.5-Mb connection.
You need to ensure that all users at the site have a good voice experience.
options: Tag all traffic with a DSCP value of 46.
Assign the Region1 users a meeting policy that has a media bit rate of 1,500 Kbps.
Create and assign a Teams Network Roaming Policy that has a media bit rate of 500 Kbs.
Run the Microsoft 365 network connectivity test tool.
